result.execSummary:
The defendant Dustin J. LaPuma was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Attempt Armed Robbery, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).
  • Battery by Prisoners, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.20(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
11:40 a.m. Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State's Exhibit 1 - marked (victim statements). Victim, T.H. statement on sentencing. Schiek/Richards/Defendant/Court statement on sentencing. 
Court Sentence - consecutive to current sentence
Each count - cc
Prison - 6 years
Initial Confinement - 3
Extended Supervision - 3
Jail credit - 61 days
CC/DNA Surcharge/Supervision Fees
Psychiatric examination and compliance with any treatment plan/recommendations.
Defendant is not eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program and Substance Abuse Programs. 
Appeal rights given. WEDS given. NADVI given. 
Adj. 12:15 p.m.

10:38 a.m. Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf209 and 15cm335. In 15cf209. Michlig states negotiated resolution - includes testimony by complaining witness who is ill today - requests today's hearing be plea hearing and sentencing be set for a later date. State files Amended Information. Court approves filing of Amended Information. Richards in receipt of Amended Information - waive further reading - Defendant enters no contest plea to remaining 2 counts on Amended Information. Plea questionnaire filed.   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty. In 15cm335 State moves to dismiss - Granted. Michlig/Richards - no PSI is being requested. Sentencing Hearing scheduled for Thursday, March 17, 2016 at 11:30 a.m. Adj. 10:51 a.m.

11:31 a.m. Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Attorney Richard appeared telephonically with leave of court. Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf209 and 15cm335. All parties in receipt of report - Richards has reviewed with Defendant. Richards statement - not disputing findings - not requesting second evaluation - requests pre-trial date. Bail continued. Adj. 11:34 a.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 4, 2016 at 10:30 am.
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery  - includes cover letter

9:02 a.m Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in court with attorney Steven G. Richards.  Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf209 and 15cm335.   Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over. State files Information - Richards in receipt of Information - waive reading - Richards, by spoecial appearance, enters Not Guilty by reason of mental disease or defect to all counts. Court appoints Dr. Michael Galli under 971.16(2) for examination of defendant. DA's office to generate Order for Examination. Counsel to contact Judge within next few days if objection to Dr. Galli. Bail continued.  Status conference scheduled for December 8, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

1:34 p.m. Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in court via video with attorney Steven G. Richards via telephone with leave of court.  Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf209 and 15cm335.   In receipt of complaint, waive reading - not guilty plea - waive time limits in felony case. 15cm335 status -same time as prelimin.
Bail continued  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 20, 2015 at 09:00 am. Adj. 1:37 p.m.

2:42 p.m. Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in court via video with attorney Mary Margaret Hogan.  Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in custody.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cm335 and 15cf209.  Hogan states Atty Richards could not be here - Hogan appearing specially for Richards. Bail continued  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 2, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

02:30 p.m. Defendant Dustin J. LaPuma in court, via video, in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf209 and 15cm335. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - Michlig statement to bail - Court sets $10,000 cash bond.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 01:15 pm. Adj. 2:35 p.m.
